description:
The other day, Cody was killing some time by playing his favorite video game. Paul Wagener showed up, wanting to go to the gym with his buddy. After trying to pry the controller out of Cody's hands to get him to come with him, Cody notcied his buddy had a bulging hard-on, which reminded Cody that he too had been extremely horny.

As you can imagine, the two hunks decided that, before heading to the gym, it would be nice and fun to have a bit of a wank session. Of course Paul couldn't pass of the opportunity to go down on his buddy, so in mid stroke, Paul reaches out his burly hand and grabs a hold of Cody's cock. With no protest given, Paul takes that as an okay to bend over and caress Cody's massive cock with his mouth.

Enjoy!
title: Oops
